page.title: 12Transport
page.content:
Most people have cars.The young people have motor bikes.There are all kinds of cars in Cribyn like FORD,VOLVO,BL, RENAULT, CITRON,HONDA,TOYOTA,TALBOT and PEUGEOT.There are cars for farmers like Land Rover, Subaru and they have four wheel drive,
There are country cars too.If an old person wanted to go to the doctor she would phone the country car and then would be taken to where she wanted to go.There are some Taxis coming to Cribyn.
There is a bus that comes in the morning to collest children to school and also a bus service in the morning and afternoon in each direction.There is a school taxi that collect children who live over 2 miles away.
